'''Purple dye''' is one of the sixteen available [[dye]]s. Crafting it is possible only with other dyes.

== Obtaining ==

== Trivia ==
* Purple dye is currently the only dye that cannot be obtained in any means other than combining other dyes, since it has no associated plant that can produce it.
** This is a reference to the dye's real life historic rarity, originally because {{W|Tyrian purple}} dye, which is made from the secretions of sea snails, was extremely expensive in antiquity.{{cn|seems speculative?}}
